short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: 20 Minute Timer is an alarm that fires after twenty minutes.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This is a 20 minute timer. It has a dual-purpose start/stop button and a reset button. When the popup is open the remaining time is visible and updated every second. A badge on the plugin's icon is visible when the timer is running and when the timer has finished. A zen bell sounds and a notification is generated when the timer elapses.
